topic: Large Language Models and AI Research

  entities:
    Llama 2|Model

  proposition: Llama 2 is an open foundation and fine-tuned chat model published in 2023.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Llama 2|PUBLISHED_IN|2023
    Llama 2|TYPE|open foundation
    Llama 2|TYPE|fine-tuned chat model

    entity-entity relationships:
    
  proposition: Llama 3 is a herd of models published as an arXiv preprint in 2024.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Llama 3|PUBLISHED_IN|2024
    Llama 3|PUBLISHED_ON|arXiv
    Llama 3|TYPE|herd of models

    entity-entity relationships:

  proposition: Meta published a statement about expanding open source large language models responsibly in 2024.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Meta|PUBLISHED_IN|2024
    Meta|ACTION|published statement about expanding open source large language models responsibly

    entity-entity relationships:

  proposition: Llama Guard is an LLM-based input-output safeguard for human-AI conversations published in 2023.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Llama Guard|PUBLISHED_IN|2023
    Llama Guard|TYPE|LLM-based input-output safeguard
    Llama Guard|PURPOSE|human-AI conversations safeguard

    entity-attribute relationships:

    Purple Llama CyberSecEval|TYPE|secure coding benchmark
    Purple Llama CyberSecEval|PURPOSE|language models evaluation

    entity-entity relationships:

  proposition: CyberSecEval 2 is a wide-ranging cybersecurity evaluation suite for large language models published in 2024.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    CyberSecEval 2|PUBLISHED_IN|2024
    CyberSecEval 2|TYPE|wide-ranging cybersecurity evaluation suite
    CyberSecEval 2|PURPOSE|large language models evaluation

    entity-entity relationships:

  proposition: CyberSecEval 3 advances the evaluation of cybersecurity risks and capabilities in large language models published in 2024.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    CyberSecEval 3|PUBLISHED_IN|2024
    CyberSecEval 3|PURPOSE|evaluate cybersecurity risks and capabilities
    CyberSecEval 3|TARGET|large language models

    entity-entity relationships:

    entity-attribute relationships:

  proposition: Microsoft Research has multiple AI-focused projects including AI for Good, AI for Health, Bioacoustics, Data Visualization, and Geospatial Machine Learning.

    Microsoft Research|HAS_PROJECTS|AI for Good
    Microsoft Research|HAS_PROJECTS|AI for Health
